llm_input_data.task_prompt: Generate an intricately detailed scene in the soft, vibrant styles of inkwash and watercolour. Use soft brushstrokes that naturally end before the edges of the canvas, blending the image as a part of the white background paper.
llm_input_data.image_prompts:
Image Description:

Amidst the rolling hills and mist-laden valleys of contemporary Scotland, a community gathers around an ancient stone hearth in a quaint village hall. A storyteller, dressed in traditional attire, holds a captivated audience of all ages, their eyes wide with wonder as they weave tales from Scottish folklore. The scene is bathed in the warm, golden light filtering through stained glass windows.

Nearby, a modern podcast studio hums with activity as contemporary storytellers record new episodes for their audiences. Their voices resonate with passion and creativity, breathing life into ancient tales and sharing them with the world.

Literary classics, like "The Wasp Factory" and "Sunset Song," grace the shelves of a local library, surrounded by works from celebrated Scottish authors J.K. Rowling, Irvine Welsh, and more. These stories are treasured relics of Scotland's rich literary heritage.

In the distance, bustling film sets come to life as crews prepare to bring "Outlander" and "Shetland" to the big screen and small, ensuring that these tales reach a global audience. Tourists flock to these locations, immersing themselves in Scotland's storytelling traditions and contributing to the local economy.

The vibrant tapestry of Scottish storytelling continues to evolve with community projects that preserve oral traditions, digital archives, and interactive storytelling apps. This rich cultural heritage is not only a source of pride for Scots but also a beacon for international collaborations, inspiring new generations of storytellers around the world.

This image encapsulates the essence of Scotland's enduring storytelling traditions, bridging the gap between past and present with its vivid colors, intriguing characters, and rich narrative depth.

data.revised_prompt: Create a detailed inkwash and watercolour scene of contemporary Scotland. Imagine rolling hills and mist-covered valleys with a community gathered around an old stone hearth in a village hall. A Middle-Eastern male storyteller in traditional attire narrates exciting tales from Scottish folklore to an audience of diverse range in age, gender and descent such as; elderly Hispanic women, young Caucasian men and South Asian children. Their faces gleam under the golden sunlight passing through multihued windows. Meanwhile, a modern podcast studio adjoining is filled with buzz; a white female and a black male host record new episodes. They speak animatedly, their voices rich with passion. A local library shelves literary classics alongside works by various authors, symbolizing the treasured literary heritage. Far off, some nameless films are being prepared for production with crews bustling about while tourists eagerly explore the area. The landscape is vivid, filled with aspects representing the transition of Scottish storytelling from oral traditions to digital archives and interactive apps. This singular image represents the diverse and rich cultural tapestry, connecting the old with the new.
